 william felton bill russell february retired american professional basketball player played center boston celtic national basketball association five-time winner nba valuable player award twelve-time all-star russell centerpiece celtic dynasty won eleven nba championship russell thirteen-year career along henri richard national hockey league montreal canadiens russell hold record championship won athlete north american sport league professional career russell led university san francisco two consecutive ncaa championship also won gold medal summer olympics captain national basketball team russell widely considered one best player nba history listed russell shot-blocking man-to-man defense major reason celtic success also inspired teammate elevate defensive play russell equally notable  article chronicle life keith miller australian test cricketer australian rule footballer birth november august left civilian life joined militia world war born town sunshine outskirt melbourne miller made sport focal point early life youngest four child scottish descent miller joined sibling inculcated love sport father playing football winter cricket summer miller engineer importance technique miller benefited small stature childhood could rely brute strength miller yearned horse racing jockey felt would physique succeed cricket football miller received secondary education academically selective melbourne high school mathematics teacher incumbent australian cricket captain bill woodfull academically poor student neglected study excelled sport made school first-choice cricket team age gained attention technical defensive ability compared woodfull miller rejected kilda cricket club joined south melbourne district competition making first-grade debut start season still tall one match scored run orchestrate lower-order fightback low-scoring match woodfull carlton team prompting teacher award silver eggcup math class remained one treasured possession following year miller grew began play cricket football power leaving school end year turned miller played cricket victorian colt two season breaking selected first-class debut late season played sporadically making sheffield shield debut season scoring maiden century time miller played exclusively yet become fast bowler miller football career also took starting miller played brighton football club victorian football  george herbert hirst september may professional english cricketer played first-class cricket yorkshire county cricket club appearance played test match england touring australia twice one best  kevin ohalloran march july australian freestyle swimmer won gold medal freestyle relay summer olympics melbourne first western australian win olympic gold ohalloran learnt swim home town katanning moved perth attend secondary schooling guildford grammar school became committed swimming competitive swimming well developed western race held muddy river hence late ohalloran moved east coast  masako katsura katsura nicknamed katsy sometimes called first lady billiards japanese carom billiards player active katsura trailblazed path woman sport competing placing among best male-dominated world professional billiards first learning game brother-in-law tutelage japanese champion kinrey matsuyama katsura became japan female professional player competition japan took second place country national three-cushion billiards championship three time exhibition noted running point game straight rail marrying army non-commissioned officer katsura emigrated united state invited play
